00034 /*
00035  * pre:
00036  * effect: constructs an CifExpr-object corresponding to IF(guard, e1, e2)
00037  */
00038 CIfExpr::CIfExpr(CExpression *guard, CExpression *e1, CExpression *e2)
00039 {
00040     m_guard = guard;
00041     m_e1 = e1;
00042     m_e2 = e2;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * pre:
00049  * effect: dereferences the object
00050  */
00051 CIfExpr::~CIfExpr()
00052 {
00053     if (m_guard)
00054         m_guard->Release();
00055 
00056     if (m_e1)
00057         m_e1->Release();
00058 
00059     if (m_e2)
00060         m_e2->Release();
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 
00071 CValue* CIfExpr::Calculate()
00072 {
00073     CValue *guardval;
00074     guardval = m_guard->Calculate();
00075     const STR_String& text = guardval->GetText();
00076     guardval->Release();
00077 
00078     if (&text == &CBoolValue::sTrueString)
00079     {
00080         return m_e1->Calculate();
00081     }
00082     else if (&text == &CBoolValue::sFalseString)
00083     {
00084         return m_e2->Calculate();
00085     }
00086     else
00087     {
00088         return new CErrorValue("Guard should be of boolean type");
00089     }
00090 }

00110 bool CIfExpr::NeedsRecalculated() 
00111 {
00112     return  (m_guard->NeedsRecalculated() ||
00113         m_e1->NeedsRecalculated() ||
00114         m_e2->NeedsRecalculated());
00115 }
